amendment.description: Page 3, line 11, strike "financial institution" and insert "vehicle financial company". Page 3, line 18, strike "financial institution" and insert "vehicle financial company". ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in Part A of House Report 115-462 to strike the term "financial institution" and replace it with "vehicle financial company" and define "vehicle financial company".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clay amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment and the bill pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Clay.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Clay amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clay amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
